Shaughnessy's Sports Grill 4255 US Hwy 1 South Suite 11 St. Augustine, FL 32086 GET DIRECTIONS Call Us Phone: (904) 797-6111 Hours Mon: 11:00 AM - 11:00PM Tue: 11:00 AM - 11:00PM Wed: 11:00 AM - 11:00PM Thu: 11:00 AM - 11:00PM Fri: 11:00 AM - 12:00AM Sat: 11:00 AM - 12:00AM Sun: 11:00 AM - 11:00PM What’s Better than Wings, Beer and Sports? Join us for all three in St. Augustine, FL Thank you for visiting the site of Shaughnessy’s Sports Grill! We have been in operation for 9 years. If you would like to know more about our menu or bar, please call today. You can also reach us by submitting the form below. We’ll be in touch and we look forward to serving you! Home Menu Events FAQs Gallery Reviews Contact Us closed id="the_header" (904) 797-6111 Directions Start block beacon_article article new RENDER Host a Memorable Event in an Exciting Space Have a fun space for your event in St. Augustine, FL Looking for an event to host a party, dinner for a reunion or a team banquet? Shaughnessy's Sport's Grill is the place for you. Celebrate your birthday with friends and some of the best wings in St. Augustine. Bring your baseball team together after a big win for delicious burgers and fries. Whether you're hosting a party or bringing a group of friends and family for dinner, you can count on fantastic service and great quality food. Call 904-797-6111 today to book your event today! Join us for our weekly events! Looking for something to do on a week night? Look forward to having a great time and meeting some of the St. Augustine, FL community at our weekly events, including: Monday -- $3 drafts all day Wednesday - Team trivia night 7-9PM Showing every NFL game on Sundays, Monday Night Football and Thursday night NFL football Friday - Live music 6-9PM Your college Football Headquarters! Choose Shaughnessy's Sports Grill today to host your celebration or event!
